00016 // -- CLASS DESCRIPTION [BDKPDFWRAPPER] --
00017 //
00018 // This class provides a wrapper for the sum of pdfs.
00019 //
00020 
00021 #include <iostream>
00022 using std::cout;
00023 using std::endl;
00024 using std::cerr;

00026 #include "RooFitCore/RooAddPdf.hh"

00028 #include "BToDKTo3piK/BdkPdfSum.hh"

00032 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 BdkPdfSum::BdkPdfSum() : _linkFracs(0) {}
00034 
00035 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 BdkPdfSum::BdkPdfSum(const char * theName,
00037                      const char * theDesc,
00038                      BdkPdfAbsBase & pdf1,
00039                      BdkPdfAbsBase & pdf2,
00040                      NameScheme scheme,
00041                      BdkPdfSum * linkFracs) {
00042   // Constructor with 2 pdfs
00043   init(theName, theDesc, pdf1, pdf2, scheme, linkFracs);
00044 }

00046 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 BdkPdfSum::BdkPdfSum(const char * theName,
00048                      const char * theDesc,
00049                      TList & pdfList,
00050                      NameScheme scheme,
00051                      BdkPdfSum * linkFracs) {
00052   // Constructor with a list of pdfs
00053   init(theName, theDesc, pdfList, scheme, linkFracs);
00054 }
00055   
00056 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 BdkPdfSum::~BdkPdfSum() {
00058   _fractions.removeAll();
00059 }
00060   
00061 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 void BdkPdfSum::init(const char * theName,
00063                      const char * theDesc,
00064                      BdkPdfAbsBase & pdf1,
00065                      BdkPdfAbsBase & pdf2,
00066                      NameScheme scheme,
00067                      BdkPdfSum * linkFracs) {
00068   // Initializer with 2 PDFs:
00069   TList pdfList;
00070   pdfList.Add(&pdf1);
00071   pdfList.Add(&pdf2);
00072   init(theName, theDesc, pdfList, scheme, linkFracs);
00073 }
00074   
00075 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 void BdkPdfSum::init(const char * theName,
00077                      const char * theDesc,
00078                      TList & pdfList,
00079                      NameScheme scheme,
00080                      BdkPdfSum * linkFracs) {
00081   // Initializer with a list of PDFs:
00082   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00083   setComponents(pdfList);
00084   _nameScheme = scheme;
00085   setLinkFracs(linkFracs);
00086 }

00088 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 void BdkPdfSum::initParameters() {
00090   // Not used, replaced essentially by makeFracms(NameScheme).
00091 }
00092 
00093 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 void BdkPdfSum::setLinkFracs(BdkPdfSum * link) {
00095   // Use the fractions of link. If link==0, makes its own fractions:
00096   _linkFracs = link;
00097   makeFracs(_linkFracs);
00098 }
00099 
00100 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00101 void BdkPdfSum::makeFracs(BdkPdfSum * theLinkFracs) {
00102   // Make the _fractions list.
00103   // First, empty the _fractions list:
00104   _fractions.removeAll();
00105 
00106   const int nFracs = numFractions();  // # of fractions needed
00107 
00108   // Check that _linkFracs has enough fractions:
00109   if (0 != _linkFracs) {
00110     if (_linkFracs->numComponents() < numComponents()) {
00111       cerr << GetName() 
00112            << "::makeFracs(): Cannot use fractions of lincFracs \""
00113            << _linkFracs->GetName() << "\"" << endl
00114            << "  which has only "
00115            << _linkFracs->numComponents() << " components while "
00116            << numComponents() << " are needed." << endl;
00117 
00118       assert(0);
00119     }
00120 
00121     if (_linkFracs->numComponents() > numComponents()) {
00122       cerr << GetName() 
00123            << "::makeFracs(): Warning: lincFracs \""
00124            << _linkFracs->GetName() << "\"" << endl
00125            << "  which has "
00126            << _linkFracs->numComponents() << " components while only "
00127            << numComponents() << " are needed. Will proceed." << endl;
00128     }
00129   } // end of checking _linkFracs->numComponents()
00130 
00131   // Loop over fractions needed:
00132   for (int c = 0; c < nFracs; ++c){
00133     if (0 != _linkFracs) {
00134       // Take the fractions from _linkFracs, and add it to the list as
00135       // non-owned:
00136       _fractions.add(*(_linkFracs->fraction(c)));
00137     }
00138     else {
00139       // Make and maintain our own fractions. First, initialize the
00140       // fraction's name:
00141       TString fracName = TString(GetName()) + ".";
00142       
00143       // The scheme determines the rest of the fracName:
00144       TString suffix;
00145       TString pdfName(component(c)->GetName());
00146       
00147       switch(_nameScheme) {
00148       case LAST:
00149         suffix = pdfName(pdfName.Last('.') + 1,  pdfName.Length() - 1);
00150         break;
00151       case FULL:
00152         suffix = pdfName;
00153         break;
00154       case NUMBER:
00155         suffix += c;
00156         break;
00157       }
00158       
00159       // Append the suffix to the name and create the title:
00160       fracName += suffix + "Frac";
00161       
00162       TString fracTitle = 
00163         TString(GetTitle()) + TString(" frac of ") + component(c)->GetTitle();
00164       
00165       // Create the fraction. The default value gives all components 
00166       // equal fractions:
00167       RooRealVar * frac = 
00168         new RooRealVar(fracName, fracTitle, 1.0/numComponents(), 0, 1);
00169 
00170       frac->setError(0.01);
00171 
00172       // Add the fraction to the list as owned:
00173       _fractions.addOwned(*frac);
00174     } // end of if no _linkFractions
00175   } // end loop on fractions needed
00176 }
00177 
00178 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00179 void BdkPdfSum::createPdf() {
00180   // Create _thePdf:
00181   _thePdf = new RooAddPdf(TString(GetName()) + ".pdf",
00182                           TString(GetTitle()) + " pdf",
00183                           componentPdfs(),
00184                           _fractions);
00185 
00186   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00187 }
00188                           
00189 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00190 BdkPdfSum::BdkPdfSum(const BdkPdfSum &) {
00191   // Forbidden copy constructor:
00192   assert(0);
00193 }
00194 
00195 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00196 BdkPdfSum & BdkPdfSum::operator=(const BdkPdfSum &) {
00197   // Forbidden assignment operator:
00198   assert(0);
00199   BdkPdfSum *pdf;
00200   return *pdf;
00201 }
00202 
00203 //-------------------------------------------------------------------
00204 void BdkPdfSum::fixFractions(Bool_t fix) {
00205   for (int f = 0; f < numFractions(); ++f){
00206     fraction(f)->setConstant(fix);
00207   }
00208 }
